summary: Provides a unit‑test suite that verifies the correctness and robustness of the Dice‑Cross‑Entropy loss implementation, checking for proper handling of invalid input shapes and confirming that computed loss values match expected results across several parameterized scenarios.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability of the Dice‑Cross‑Entropy loss used in medical image segmentation pipelines, enabling early detection of defects and supporting quality assurance for downstream AI models.
